name: sacred-sword
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target's stat modifiers, including evasion.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user attacks by slicing with its long
horns. The target’s stat changes
don’t affect this attack’s damage.
